## Public Member Attributes

### AddrSize {#a9dda1ead802a424c83670016194a4536}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFListTableHeader::Header::AddrSize</>}>
The size in bytes of an address on the target architecture.

For segmented addressing, this is the size of the offset portion of the address.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h">DWARFListTable.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Length {#ab31b28ece705510cedf32903b9688ed4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::DWARFListTableHeader::Header::Length = 0</>}>
The total length of the entries for this table, not including the length field itself.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h">DWARFListTable.h</a>.

### OffsetEntryCount {#a2a9da3e724903ac479081a7e2683602c}

<MemberDefinition

The number of offsets that follow the header before the range lists.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h">DWARFListTable.h</a>.

### SegSize {#a3234cb520b3e885f51460778a51a3d8a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFListTableHeader::Header::SegSize</>}>
The size in bytes of a segment selector on the target architecture.

If the target system uses a flat address space, this value is 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarflisttable-h">DWARFListTable.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
